name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Christopher M. MCELYNN, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. McElynn

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Christopher M. MCELYNN, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of July, 2001, upon consideration of the Petition for Dissolution of an Order of Temporary Suspension Entered Pursuant to Rule 208(f), Pa.R.D.E., filed by the Office of Disciplinary Counsel, it is hereby
ORDERED that this Court’s Order of July 7, 1998, placing Respondent on temporary suspension pursuant to Rule 208(f), Pa.R.D.E ., is hereby dissolved.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
779 A.2d 486
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Christopher M. MCELYNN, Respondent.
No. 440 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 10, 2001.
